summary: When a ship sinks during a storm, a slave from the industrial island of Plutonia is washed up on the beaches of paradise island Melonia, where the "all-powerful" wizard Prospero and his strange friends reside.
cast: Allan Edwall|Robyn Carlsson|Olle Sarri|Tomas von Brömssen|Ernst Günther|Jan-Olof Strandberg|Ingvar Kjellson|Eva Rydberg|Jan Blomberg|Hans Alfredson|Nils Eklund
title: Viatge a Melònia
